name: Terracell
description:
One bow, one island, one life... it's man against the wilderness. Only the greatest of survivors can last. How long can you?

★Information★

One bow, one island, one life... it's man against the wilderness. Only the greatest of survivors can last. How long can you?

★Controls★

Use the arrow keys to move.

Hold Z to run.

Hold and release X to use your bow.

★Instructions★

Kill the animals and walk over them to sustain your hunger meter from reaching zero. Running startles enemies from a greater distance so it is ideal to run when being chased! Submit your score to the leaderboards!

★Update - 20/05/16★

  • Rain can be toggled on/off
  • Higher resolution option available
  • Fullscreen toggle available (Windows only)
  • Game over bug fix

    • #LOWREZJAM2016
